content: the instep needle knit across the remainder of the sole until 2 stitches remain transfer those last 2 unworked stitches to the instep needle now you re ready for toe shaping from this point on follow the chart for the instep stitches as for the sole stitches decrease as follows row 1 knit row 2 knit 1 ssk knit across until 3 stitches remain k2tog k1 row 3 5 7 11 13 row 1 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 row 2 row 14 15 16 17 18 row 2 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 toe if you ended with row 11 / \ / \ / \ / \ / \ / \ / \ - - - - ^ - - / \ - - - - / \ - - - / \ - / \ - - - - - b - - b - - b - ^ - b - - b - cid 1  4 p o l l y j e a n cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 toe if you ended with row 5 / \ / \ / \ / \ / \ / \ / \ - - - - ^ - - / \ - - - - / \ - / \ - - - - - - / \ - - b - - b - ^ - b - - b - - b - finishing cut the yarn leaving 12 inch tail graft the remaining stitches weave in any loose ends now you re done enjoy pattern and images* © 2009 by mj kim for personal use only not for sale or profit be nice see more of my work at http //www exartstudent net/ *additional photo by ariel altaras thank you cid 1  5 p o l l y j e a n optional charts for a mirrored pair cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cuff for mirrored pair - b - - b - l ^ r - b - - b - - b - b row 11 - b - - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - - b - b row 7-10 - b - rt - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - lt - b - b row 6 - b - - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - b - - b - b row 1-5 30 20 10 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 main for mirrored pair - b - - b - l ^ r - b - - b - - b - b - b - - b - / \ - b - o o - b
